price: Sila Gooftan kee Abbootii Arbaa irratti akkam akka dalage hin arginee?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
